name: SlayTheCube 2
description:
There is 10 levels in each level pack. Level Packs that have boss levels are going to normally locked behind a difficulty (Impossible) that's the only way to play the boss levels. (FOR PACKS WITH HIDDEN BOSS LEVELS: 10 levels = 5 normal levels and 5 boss levels. IF YOU DON'T PLAY ON IMPOSSIBLE YOU ONLY CAN PLAY 5 LEVELS!) There's only going to be a total of 9 level packs that can be active at once and 3 of those are taken up and always active (NOT ALL OF THEM ARE COMPLETE) this means future packs can be turned of in favor of mods! (More info soon)

I'm working on remaking the first SlayTheCube's levels for a playable level pack!

Modding:

This is a feature I'm working on right now! All the engine stuff is in place I just need to design the mod menu. I'm also adding in game scripting and tools to easily make maps and various other things. I will try to make docs for everything and example code for you guys! I can't wait to share more about it in the future!

Features Coming Soon:

+ Ability to change joystick properties

 + Controller Support (Hopefully)

 + Modding (in progress)

 + More Levels and Updates to existing level packs!

 + Modding Tools [Level Editor] (in progress)

 + More Level Packs

 + Music Player (Maybe)

Please give feedback!
